Name: assign_worker_to_team
Description: Binary assignment of workers to teams

Name: select_user_story_for_sprint
Description: Binary selection of user stories for sprint

Name: set_sprint_duration
Description: Duration of a sprint in days

Name: schedule_sprint_start_date
Description: Planned start date of a sprint

Name: define_task_status
Description: Status of a task during sprint

Name: set_worker_availability
Description: Weekly availability of worker in hours

Name: moderate_retrospective_assignment
Description: Assignment of Scrum Master to moderate

Name: update_product_backlog_order
Description: Order index of item in backlog

Name: trigger_development_snapshot
Description: Whether a snapshot is generated after sprint
